15573.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「お:

15574.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「…:

15575.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ギ:

15576.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:

15577.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「し:

15578.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「<:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc>, this tomb is for someone whom, in my

15579.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「名:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>His name was Gagabes. His strength was, far and away,
greater than that of someone like myself. He was called
the strongest champion ever and was the village's hero.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15580.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「わ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>No matter how many times I challenged him, I truly
couldn't compete with Gagabes. But one day, during
a match...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15581.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「わ: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>It was like my fist was sucked into Gagabes' gut...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15582.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>That hit was nothing more than a stroke of luck.

15583.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「あ:

15584.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「当:

15585.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:

15586.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ガ:

15587.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「苦:

15588.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Their son's name is Gagai... He was only 6 years old

15589.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「い:

15590.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「…:

15591.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>And on that day you saved me... A letter from Gagai

15592.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「手:

15594.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「勝:

15595.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「い:
